abstract: President Dmitri A. Medvedev set out on Friday to woo overseas investors at his country’s largest foreign investment forum, a sharp contrast to previous years, The New York Times reported.
snippet: President Dmitri A. Medvedev set out on Friday to woo overseas investors at his country’s largest foreign investment forum, a sharp contrast to previous years, The New York Times reported.
lead_paragraph: President Dmitri A. Medvedev set out on Friday to woo overseas investors at his country’s largest foreign investment forum, a sharp contrast to previous years, The New York Times’s Andrew E. Kramer reported.

headline.main: Russia Steps Up Effort to Woo Foreign Investors
